content: In case anyone reads this topic to find out about stdin: made a function to read it in chunks, no more stack overflow, but performance is surprisingly awful
Artem has marked this topic as resolved.

Artem said:

I made https://github.com/roc-lang/basic-cli/issues/416 for the perf issue
